itemDescription: British pilot and decorated Royal Air Force officer

wikipedia_page.main: Air Vice-Marshal Philip Jeremy Robinson,  is a decorated British pilot and senior Royal Air Force officer.

response: * Philip Robinson, RAF pilot who was awarded the DFC three times.
*Philip Robinson (music), English conductor, arranger and music educator
* Philip Robinson (RAF officer), decorated Royal Air Force officer

link_mentions.page: Structure of the Royal Air Force
response: No. 11 Group is the newest group formed in the RAF, having only been reformed in late 2018 as a "multi-domain operations group." Air Vice-Marshal Philip Robinson has been the AOC, since December 2021.
